ValidationRule.description: The Effective Date must be between 1/7 and 30/06 of the relevant year.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'StarTrack', OR( Confirmed_Date__c > DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) + 1, 6, 30), Confirmed_Date__c < DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), 7, 1) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ensure the Effective Date must be between 1/7 and 30/06 of the relevant year.
